thread.title: Suspects sang like canaries, say metro cops
thread.title_full: Suspects sang like canaries, say metro cops | News24

author: news24.com
title: Suspects sang like canaries, say metro cops
text:
Johannesburg - Nine people were arrested for a robbery and a separate drive-by shooting that left one person dead on the East Rand on Thursday, Ekurhuleni metro police said.
Spokesperson Chief Superintendent Wilfred Kgasago said the four people arrested for the shooting, and the five alleged house robbers, all admitted to their crimes.
The drive-by shooting happened at the Somhlolo taxi rank in Vosloorus on Thursday. Several people were shot and wounded.
The four alleged shooters were found in a white Toyota Hilux, and were allegedly in possession of three loaded and licensed firearms.
